Constructor & Destructor Documentation

CFGReader::CFGReader ( const string &  configfilename)

Constructor for CFGReader.

This method is used to load the configuration file for WCS. Each configuration item looks like a key-value pair, CFGReader() will read the file to memory and store the parameters to a KVP array.

Parameters:
configfilenameThe full path of the configuration file.

Member Function Documentation

string CFGReader::getValue ( const string &  keyname)

Fetch a configured item's value.

This method is used to fetch a items value from a configuration file.

Parameters:
keynameThe item's name.
Returns:
The result string.
string CFGReader::getValue ( const string &  keyname,
const string &  defaultvalue 
)

Fetch a configured item's value, with default value.

This method is used to fetch a items value from a configuration file, if not found, use the default value.

Parameters:
keynameThe item's name.
defaultvalueThe item's default value.
Returns:
The result string.
